title: Serene Scandinavian Duplex Near Zamosc Waterfront
description: Immerse yourself in minimalist Scandinavian charm with this contemporary duplex located in the heart of Zamosc’s Stare Miasto. Offering 5 thoughtfully designed bedrooms and 3 sleek bathrooms, this 187 sqm home exudes modernity and simplicity. Enjoy the seamless flow between airy living spaces and the calming facade that maximizes light and elegance. Expansive balconies and elevator access ensure comfort whether welcoming guests or unwinding in solitude.
neighborhood_description: Set in the family-friendly Stare Miasto neighborhood, this property balances historic atmosphere with contemporary living. Close proximity to the stately waterfront and abundant green spaces create a warm setting for walks, play, and relaxation. Superb public transport links and quick highway access make commuting and exploring easy from your doorstep.
target_buyer: Ideal for pet-loving families or professionals who value clean design and pet-friendly living amidst historic surroundings.
market_positioning: This duplex offers a unique blend of Scandinavian design and functional amenities rarely seen in Zamosc’s market, promising optimal comfort with understated elegance in a highly sought-after district.
